msg: Refactored source processors to have a common abstract base class

author: felixk
msg: Build by default a distribution for your current platform. Additional platform distribution builds can be add by indicating the profile of your choice.
mvn install -Pmacosx --> dists for linux-x86 and macosx

author: stack
msg: HADOOP-2507 REST servlet does not properly base64 row keys and column names

author: felixk
msg: It doesn't matter which swt we use for compiling, but it must be a platform specific one. To simplify things just use one (in this case it's the linux-x86 one)
